topic.title: [OOOH YEAH] France Wonâ€™t Tax Crypto-Only Trades, Will Tax Crypto-to-Fiat Sales
topic.body:
Thank you France! Thank you so much for making crypto to crypto trades tax free. That is SO KIND!
If it wasn't for the new law traders wouldn't have anything better to do than reporting their trades to the tax office as they always have done before.

topic.title: Governments suppressing crypto?
topic.body:
Governments and their criminal henchmen are successfully suppressing the price of precious metals.

They always want to stop a tax free migration from fiat into assets they can't fully control. And since they cannot control cryptos, it cannot be ruled out that they are suppressing them too.

Do you believe that they are suppressing crypto? I do!

topic.title: This is what happens in the crypto market
topic.body:
start:

1) Whale buys BTC 

2) BTC price rises

3) When-Lambo crypto kiddies buy BTC

4) BTC price rises more

5) Whale dumps BTC 

6) BTC price falls

7) When-Lambo crypto kiddies sell with a loss

8) BTC price falls more

goto start;

topic.title: stock markets do not make any sense
topic.body:
today ,  despite the Covid-19 pandemic , the US indexes have gained about 5 %

Does anybody have a clue why? Is the FED turning the USD into toilet paper? Has Trump made another 'great deal'?

...

2020: Corona pandemic & major supply disruptions - stocks are booming

2030: Asteroid hits earth kills 99% of the worlds population - stocks are booming

2040: WW3 only about 1000 people have survived - stocks are booming

topic.title: Covid-19 is nature's response to the human race exploiting earth
topic.body: ...and i'm sure nature has mechanisms to wipe out the human race completely. Someday there will be a virus that spreads as easy as Covid-19 but is deadly like Ebola.

topic.title: My personal wet dream is to see markets collapse :)
topic.body: Go Covid-19 go! Put the markets in a global long-lasting recession. It's overdue.
